sentences.sentence: A UN-sponsored summit in Paris has agreed to create a blueprint for a global plastic treaty by the end of 2024.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: India's Odisha state is in mourning after a crash involving three trains killed at least 280 people in one of the country's worst rail disasters in decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The deaths followed a collision between two passenger trains and a freight train some 220 kilometers southwest of Kolkata.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Officials say all the bodies and hundreds of injured passengers have now been removed from the accident site. Prime Minister Narendra Modi flew to the crash scene and spent half an hour examining the relief efforts and talking to rescue officials. He then visited a number of the injured in hospital. India's railway minister has ordered a high-level inquiry into the collision to determine if it was caused by human error in signaling or track deterioration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Despite government efforts to improve rail safety, several hundred accidents occur every year on India's railways, the largest train network under one management in the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Northern Kosovo and ethnically Serbian protesters gathered in the town of Zvekan. It's in the Serb-majority Mitrovica region and they're demanding the removal of ethnically

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Albanian mayors elected in April elections largely boycotted by the region's Serbs. They also want the withdrawal of Kosovo's special forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The protest took place in the presence of KFOR soldiers, NATO-led peacekeepers who stepped up their presence in Svekan following clashes on May 29 that left 80 people injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Kosovo's Prime Minister Albin Koti accused Belgrade of orchestrating those clashes, saying they were planned, well-organized and had an author.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He said the author is official Belgrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Kosovo, a former region of Serbia, became independent in 2008 but has never been recognized by Belgrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Three Israeli soldiers and one Egyptian officer were killed along their shared border after a deadly gunfight broke out on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: An Israeli military spokesperson said the fighting began overnight when soldiers thwarted a drug smuggling attempt across the border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A male and female soldier were found dead at an army post.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The army said the Egyptian police officer was killed in a second exchange of fire in which a third soldier was killed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Deadly violence is rare between the countries who signed a peace treaty in 1979 and maintain close security ties.

sentences.sentence: Iran released two Austrians and a Dane who'd been jailed by the government in Tehran.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: One of the released Austrians was arrested in 2016 for allegedly spying for the United States, the other in 2019 for what were described as national security offences.
